title: U.S. advanced flat glass prices in 1999 and 2019 by glass type
summary: This grouped bar chart represents 8 different Glass Types on X-axis for 2 groups 1999, and 2019. On the Y-axis it shows their corresponding SOME LABEL.
Glass Type Smart glass had the maximum SOME LABEL among all 2 groups, and it was for 1999. The minimum SOME LABEL was observed in Glass Type Safety glass for 2019.
In Glass Type Low-emissivity glass, 2019 had the highest SOME LABEL among all 8 Glass Types and it has the lowest SOME LABEL in Glass Type Safety glass.
The maximum SOME LABEL for 2019 that was found in Glass Type Low-emissivity glass was 20.37 times larger than the minimum SOME LABEL observed in Glass Type Safety glass.
min_summary: This grouped bar chart shows SOME LABEL on the Y-axis for 8 different Glass Types for 2 groups 1999, and 2019 that are presented on the X-axis.
Glass Type Smart glass had the maximum SOME LABEL among all 2 groups, and it was for 1999. The minimum SOME LABEL was observed in Glass Type Safety glass for 2019.
mid_summary: This grouped bar chart represents 8 different Glass Types on X-axis for 2 groups 1999, and 2019. On the Y-axis it shows their corresponding SOME LABEL.
Glass Type Smart glass had the maximum SOME LABEL among all 2 groups, and it was for 1999. The minimum SOME LABEL was observed in Glass Type Safety glass for 2019.
In Glass Type Low-emissivity glass, 2019 had the highest SOME LABEL among all 8 Glass Types and it has the lowest SOME LABEL in Glass Type Safety glass.
The maximum SOME LABEL for 2019 that was found in Glass Type Low-emissivity glass was 20.37 times larger than the minimum SOME LABEL observed in Glass Type Safety glass.
max_summary: This grouped bar chart shows SOME LABEL on the Y-axis for 8 different Glass Types for 2 groups 1999, and 2019 that are presented on the X-axis.
In Glass Type Smart glass, 1999 had the highest SOME LABEL 3805.0 among the 2 groups and in Safety glass, 2019 had the lowest SOME LABEL 68.0.
Among all the Glass Types, 2019 had the highest SOME LABEL in Glass Type Low-emissivity glass and lowest SOME LABEL in Glass Type Safety glass.
There is a gap of 1317.0 between the highest and lowest SOME LABEL found for 2019 in Glass Type Low-emissivity glass and Safety glass.
Out of all 2 groups, the highest gap between the maximum and minimum SOME LABEL was found in case of 1999.
On average, the Glass Type Smart glass had the highest SOME LABEL for all 2 groups 1999, and 2019. Whereas Safety glass had the lowest average SOME LABEL.
